game.name: Dead Hand
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dead Hand is a retro-styled, high-tension Blackjack game focused on quick matches, smart decisions, and duels that can flip in an instant. The rules are simple, but every round hits hard, one card can make you a legend or wipe you out instantly.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dead Hand is a retro-styled, high-tension Blackjack game focused on quick matches, smart decisions, and duels that can flip in an instant. The rules are simple, but every round hits hard, one card can make you a legend or wipe you out instantly.
